data.name: Struggle For Survival VR : Battle Royale - Harli
data.detailed_description:
New character added!

Harli used to be a psychologist who likes Cosplay and comics. After the broke out of the zombie, she ran for their lives with his daughter. They were attacked by zombies two days before arriving at the interim government-controlled area. Although Harli has successfully escaped, her daughter died unfortunately because of her injuries. The death of her daughter is a massive blow to her, which makes her crazy and radicalized since then. She likes the dressing style of Halle Quinn, holding a bat and having a great lethality

When you purchase this DLC, all game characters can join the game with Harli's unique bat.
